channel.title: Comments on: YNAB: You Need A Budget

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/08/08/ynab-you-need-a-budget/#comment-4371">Adam</a>.
Yes, I use the budget features as well. I agree that if you don't follow their <a href="https://www.youneedabudget.com/method" rel="nofollow">four rules</a> then it does add a bit more complexity. Even with that trade off I'd still recommend it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Adam.

Yes, I use the budget features as well. I agree that if you don’t follow their four rules then it does add a bit more complexity. Even with that trade off I’d still recommend it.

item.title: By: Adam
item.dc:creator: Adam
item.description: Do you use the budgeting features at all? I've tried to, but their system is maybe just too complicated for me. After a bit I always end up just using it more as an expense tracker, just to see if I spending too much on this or that.
item.content:encoded: Do you use the budgeting features at all? I’ve tried to, but their system is maybe just too complicated for me. After a bit I always end up just using it more as an expense tracker, just to see if I spending too much on this or that.
